page.title: 20Customs and Credits
page.content:
{Braithwell & Micklebring Association hold a{wheelbarrow race}every year. One person pushes another sitting in a wheelbarrow from Braithwell to {Micklebring}and back, a distance of {3 miles.}They rest at the{"Plough"}at {Micklebring,}where they drink a pint of beer.Hundreds of people watch the fun each year.
{Bramley Grange Class J4}signing off:_ Mrs. C.C.Smith, Richard Atton,Mark Bowker,Gregg Garbet Paul Cartlidge,John Driver,Wayne Langford,Darrell Reivytis,Paul Windle, Martin Wilcox,Lisa Curtis,Jayne Eames, Mikaler Cutts,Deborah Ellis,Julie Pratt,Teresa Sargent,Joanne Smith, Nichola Smith,Cheryl Thompson,Gillian Thomson.
